snippet.title: Wanderlust Travel Stories - Launch Trailer || Steam, GOG.com, iOS
snippet.description:
Let the journey change you! Watch the launch trailer for Wanderlust Travel Stories, a text-based adventure game set in the real world.

Step into the shoes of various travelers and shape their journeys. What to pack? How to travel? What to say? Make decisions big and small and see how your perception of the world changes.

Play it on iPhone, Mac and PC (Steam and GOG.com).

- Buy on iPhone/iPad: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1467367822
- Buy on Mac: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1467488731
- Buy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1051410/Wanderlust_Travel_Stories/
- Buy on GOG.com: https://www.gog.com/game/wanderlust_travel_stories

Follow us:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/differenttales/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/differenttales
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/differenttalesgames/
